message: I have a unique opportunity to sell you a high-value product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm looking for $11500 for it.
I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $10000 for it.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $11000.
Thank you for your offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product and would like to counter with $10500.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, but I need to make a bit more than that. I can offer it to you for $11250, which is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I believe we can find a middle ground. I would like to counter with $11000 for the product.
I'm close to the value I was hoping for, but I need to make a bit more. I can offer it to you for $11500, which is the highest I'm willing to go.
I understand your position, but I would like to propose a final offer of $11250 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer, but I'm willing to meet you at $11250. I'll sell it to you for $11250, but this is my final offer.
